prompts: Create a dragon-type Pokemon with fluffy white fur and teal accents.
I want a dragon-like Pokemon that has a friendly disposition and unique features.
Generate a whimsical character that resembles a dragon and has a gentle appearance.
Make a Pokemon that embodies both dragon and normal types with soft colors.
Imagine a Pokemon that looks like a dragon but has a cuddly and approachable look.
Design a creature with a long body, unique colors, and a friendly expression.
Show me a Pokemon that combines elements of dragons and whimsical spirits.
